comment: She is a very sweet lady but she doesn't explain anything in class and when there is a problem she doesn't know how to fix it. I feel like someone else created this class and she's just a puppet or stand in because there weren't enough teachers to teach the course. Nothing is learned in class so if you're going to take this class I recommend online

She makes ridiculous quizzes and tests , very strict grader, confusing instructions, doesn't ever clearly give an answer to a question, frequently makes grading mistakes. Just an overall bad class and I would not recommend to anyone. Wish I could of dropped the class when I had the chance.

Worst professor I have ever taken. She is scatterbrained, grades extremely toughly for no reason, doesn't explain anything, and doesn't actually TEACH. I doubt she even knows anything about what she's teaching. AVOID AT ALL COSTS.
